title_long: <html><head><title>This title is way too long to be a useful title.  You should really try to keep the length to a reasonable size</title></head></html>
title_keyword_stuffed: <html><head><title>Web Design, Design, Website Design, Design Websites in Atlanta</title></head></html>
description_long: <html><head><meta name='description' content='This description is way too long to be a useful description.  You should really try to keep the length to a reasonable size.This description is way too long to be a useful description.  You should really try to keep the length to a reasonable size. Its just way too long and try not to do this.'/></head></html>
description_generic_page: <html><head><meta name='description' content='this is a web page that does something' /></head></html>
a_tag_lengthy: Avoid using lengthy links with unnecessary parameters
a_tag_text_too_long: Click here if you want to see something really cool. We will do a bunch of magic and you may get spammed.
a_tag_text_equals_href: Avoid using the page URL as the anchor text
a_tag_external_href: Avoid passing your reputation to non-relevant websites
h1_missing: Each page should have at least one h1 tag
keyword_metatag_used: <html><head><meta name='keywords' content='dogs, dog, doggy, puppy, wolf, bulldogs, pugs' /></head></html>
The Keywords Metatag should be avoided
lack_of_text_on_page:
This is a good header

but not enough text
The average word count for top-ranking content is 1,140 - 1,285 words
not_canonical_url: Only one version of a URL (Canonical URL)
img_lengthy_alt_tag: Avoid writing excessively long alt text
